channel.title: CVE Feed for Sophos -- Sophos Web Appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sophos -- Sophos Web Appliance

item.title: CVE-2020-36692|2024-08-04T17:37:05.255Z -- sophos -- sophos%20web%20appliance
item.description: A reflected XSS via POST vulnerability in report scheduler of Sophos Web Appliance versions older than 4.3.10.4 allows execution of JavaScript code in the victim browser via a malicious form that must be manually submitted by the victim while logged in to SWA.
